commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw firewall status list
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw firewall status list --firewall-name
                                            --resource-group
                                            [--max-items]
                                            [--next-token]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw firewall status list --resource-group MyResourceGroup -n MyCloudngfwFirewall
